requirements.text: Implement a premium, production-ready mobile-first menu UI for an Indian cafe, matching the requested modern minimalist, warm Indian hospitality aesthetic (inviting, clean, elegant, Instagram-worthy) and avoiding generic template styling.

quotes: Create a premium, production-ready QR code menu website for an Indian cafe with these specifications:
Style: Modern minimalist with warm, sophisticated Indian hospitality vibes
NOT generic AI design - make it distinctive and memorable

acceptanceCriteria: The UI looks premium and distinctive (not a default template) with warm neutrals, generous whitespace, subtle cultural touches, and polished details (shadows/borders/rounded corners).
The layout is optimized for 375‚Äì428px widths and does not produce horizontal scrolling at those sizes.

requirements.text: Apply a single coherent visual theme across the entire site (colors, typography, spacing rhythm, component styling) using warm neutral backgrounds (cream/beige/off-white), high-contrast deep charcoal/black text, and exactly one accent color chosen from the provided options; use #D97706 (saffron orange) as the sole accent color.

No purple gradient-on-white look is used.

Prices: Bold, accent color, clearly visible

requirements.text: Provide compact navigation controls that allow users to move between section pages without covering the entire menu (e.g., small next/prev controls and/or a compact pager). Navigation must be usable on small screens and visually minimal.

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation controls are always discoverable but occupy minimal screen real estate and do not block key content.

requirements.text: Use high-quality food photography via direct Unsplash image URLs optimized for fast loading (include width/height and crop params like ?w=400&h=400&fit=crop) while ensuring circular cropping looks good; fall back to a tasteful placeholder when an image is missing.

requirements.text: Ensure accessibility and mobile quality: semantic structure for headings/sections, readable contrast, no tiny fonts, no horizontal scroll, and motion that respects users who prefer reduced motion.

quotes: Semantic HTML for accessibility

No horizontal scrolling
